name: @tertium/vscode-js-shared-configs
description: Visual Studio Code JS shared configs.

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release:git
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release:git
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release:git
scripts.release:git: git add package.json && git commit -m "update package.json version" && git checkout main && git merge develop && git push origin main && git tag v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git push origin --tags

author: Vitalii Balabanov
